questions.description: This question will be resolved using data from the International Monetary Fund (http://data.imf.org/regular.aspx?key=61015893), and can be found after ensuring the country of interest is selected from the Country drop down menu, and 'Consumer Price Index, All Items' is selected from the Indicator drop down menu. The relevant row is: '[Country of Interest], Consumer Price Index, All Items,' and the relevant column will be '2018 [Month of Interest].' Question will be resolved based on initially reported values expected to be published the first week of the following month.

answers.name: Between -0.16 and 0.29, inclusive

answers.name: More than 0.29
answers.question_name: What will be the monthly Period-over-Period change in the consumer price index (CPI) for Guinea-Bissau in March 2018 (Month 3)?

questions.description: This question will be resolved using monthly data reported by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) at https://data.oecd.org/interest/long-term-interest-rates.htm. Data is retrievable via download or on the 'Long-term interest rates' table on the web site. The relevant country can be found in the HIGHLIGHTED COUNTRIES or LOCATION field, and the relevant time period can be found in the TIME field. Question will be resolved when the data is released, likely the month after the period of interest.
questions.name: What will be the long-term interest rate for Greece (GRC) in March 2018?

answers.name: Less than 4.15
answers.question_name: What will be the long-term interest rate for Greece (GRC) in March 2018?

answers.name: Between 4.15 and 4.73, inclusive
answers.question_name: What will be the long-term interest rate for Greece (GRC) in March 2018?

answers.name: More than 4.73
answers.question_name: What will be the long-term interest rate for Greece (GRC) in March 2018?

questions.description: This question will be resolved using the United States Geological Survey's Earthquake Catalog (https://earthquake.usgs.gov/earthquakes/search/). The relevant data can be found by setting the Magnitude to a Custom Minimum equal to the magnitude of interest; setting the Date & Time to a Custom Start with the first day of interest and End to the last day of interest, leaving the UTC times to the default settings (00:00:00 & 23:59:59). Set Geographic Region to World, click Search beneath Output Options; note the number of earthquakes shown in the top left Search Results window.
questions.name: How many earthquakes of magnitude 5 or stronger will occur worldwide in March 2018?

answers.name: Less than 101
answers.question_name: How many earthquakes of magnitude 5 or stronger will occur worldwide in March 2018?

answers.name: Between 101 and 140, inclusive

answers.name: More than 140 but less than 174
answers.question_name: How many earthquakes of magnitude 5 or stronger will occur worldwide in March 2018?

answers.name: Between 174 and 213, inclusive
answers.question_name: How many earthquakes of magnitude 5 or stronger will occur worldwide in March 2018?

answers.name: More than 213
answers.question_name: How many earthquakes of magnitude 5 or stronger will occur worldwide in March 2018?

questions.description: The parliamentary election is scheduled for April 8, 2018. Prime Minister Viktor Orbán’s right-wing populist Hungarian Civic Party, Fidesz, is hoping to regain its two-thirds majority in parliament after losing it in a 2015 by-election (https://www.politico.eu/article/hungary-to-hold-general-election-on-april-8/). The Christian Democrat People's party (KDNP) has been closely associated with Fidesz since 1998 and is currently its coalition partner. Question will be resolved based on the number of seats won by Fidesz and KDNP.
questions.name: Will Fidesz and KDNP win 133 or more seats in Hungary's upcoming parliamentary election?

answers.name: Yes
answers.question_name: Will Fidesz and KDNP win 133 or more seats in Hungary's upcoming parliamentary election?

questions.description: his question will be resolved using the Multisensor Analyzed Sea Ice Extent - Northern Hemisphere (MASIE-NH) data reported by NOAA's National Snow & Ice Data Center (http://nsidc.org/data/masie). The relevant data can be accessed by clicking the ‘Download Data’ button, then selecting 'Daily Sea Ice Extent Values: Comma Separated Values (CSV) file' and looking at the column for the relevant region. If the maximum occurs before the close date, the question will be closed retroactively with the first date of the maximum as the end date of the question.

answers.name: Less than 450,000

questions.description: This question will be resolved using the Multisensor Analyzed Sea Ice Extent - Northern Hemisphere (MASIE-NH) data reported by NOAA's National Snow & Ice Data Center (http://nsidc.org/data/masie). To access the relevant data: - Click the ‘Download Data’ button, - Select 'Daily Sea Ice Extent Values: Comma Separated Values (CSV) file' - Look at the column for the relevant region. If the maximum occurs before the close date, the question will be closed retroactively with the first date of the maximum as the end date of the question.

questions.description: This question will be resolved using the last daily London Bullion Market Association (LBMA) Gold Price USD (PM) http://www.lbma.org.uk/pricing-and-statistics for the date of interest. The relevant data is available by selecting 'Table' and referring to the 'PM' column under 'USD.' Question will be closed on the day before the date of interest and resolved the day after the date of interest.

questions.description: The Armed Conflict Location and Event Dataset (ACLED) summarizes press reports on conflict and protest events in Africa and parts of Asia. The relevant data can be accessed using the export tool at https://www.acleddata.com/data/: set ‘From’ to the first day of the period of interest; ‘To’ to the last day of the period of interest; and ‘Country’ to the country of interest. Click ‘Export.’ The question will resolve as "yes" if ACLED records any event for which ‘event_type’ is Riots/Protests. Question will be resolved when the relevant data is first released. If a qualifying event is recorded, the question will be closed retroactively with the date of the first event as the end date of the question.
questions.name: Will ACLED record any riot/protest events in Gabon in April 2018?

answers.name: Yes
answers.question_name: Will ACLED record any riot/protest events in Gabon in April 2018?
